alert.note: Alert for Tutuila and Aunuu (American Samoa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS American Samoa (Pago Pago, American Samoa)
info.headline: Flash Flood Statement issued December 21 at 9:59AM SST by NWS American Samoa
info.description: ...THE FLASH FLOOD WARNING HAS BEEN CANCELLED... FLASH FLOOD WARNING CANCELLED FOR TUTUILA AUNUU . Rainfall have diminished in the past hour. Please note the Flash Flood Watch still remains for all islands until tonight. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Remain cautious when driving in low lying areas...and report any flooded roadways to the emergency operations center (EOC). They will relay your report to the National Weather Service Office. && UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA OFISA O LE TAU PAGO PAGO AS 10 TAEAO ASO TOFI TESEMA 21 2023 ...UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA... UA FAAMUTAINA LAPATAIGA MO TAFEGA MA LOLOGA MO TUTUILA AUNUU . Ua faaitiitia timuga i luga o Tutuila ma Aunu`u. FAUTUAGA/TAPENAGA... Mo ave-taavale, aua ne`i uia nofoaga po o ala-tele ua lolo-vaia. Ia aga`i atu i nofoaga mapu`epu`e. Ia ripotia tulaga louloua o le tau i le ofisa o le TEMCO. E latou te faailoa mai i le Ofisa o le Tau a outou ripoti.
